#!/bin/bash
# This script is automatically created by submit_postprocess function to execute
#   functions and arguments that are submitted to slurm via sbatch
#   - do not edit by hand -

#SBATCH --ntasks=<<ntasks>>
#SBATCH --qos=<<sclass>>
#SBATCH --account=<<group>>
#SBATCH --output=<<stdout>>
#SBATCH --error=<<stderr>>
#SBATCH --workdir=<<workdir>>
#SBATCH --mail-type=END
#SBATCH --job-name=lpjmlkit
<<dependency>>
<<memory_alloc>>

<<module_load>>

Rscript <<rscript_file>>

echo -e "\nR script:" <<rscript_file>>
echo "batch script:" <<sbatch_file>>
